casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joe Robert REYNOLDS 155P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Reynolds, Joe Robert. William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Joe Reynolds, for Reynolds, Joe Robert

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
